## Type of Change

## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass: `pytest tests/`
- [ ] Linting passes: `ruff check src tests`
- [ ] Formatting: `ruff format src tests`
- [ ] Type check: `mypy src/citysense`
- [ ] Commit messages follow Conventional Commits
